actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to include sons and daughters within the provision relating to waiving the exclusion from the United States for fraud.

summary.text: Includes son and daughters within the provision of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to waiving the exclusion from the United States for fraud. (Amends 8 U.S.C. 1182(i))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to include sons and daughters within the provision relating to waiving the exclusion from the United States for fraud.
